definitions.definition: A term of endearment between friends; derived from "family" but not used between relatives.
examples: Hey fam , how you doin'? / Safe mate, safe.
definitions.label_groups: slang , chiefly African-American Vernacular , MLE , MTE , Internet slang

examples: The tourist board organized fam junkets for travel agents.
She arranged back-to-back fams and took her boyfriend.

secondary_definitions: ( slang , chiefly African-American Vernacular , MLE , MTE , Internet slang ) A term of endearment between friends; derived from "family" but not used between relatives.
( colloquial , hospitality industry ) Clipping of familiarization
